hotels.name: Westin Hotel & Resorts
hotels.description: Thinking about visiting New York? I have a 10+-bedroom hotel that will be perfect for your stay. This comfortable rental comes with amenities such as AC, Wi-Fi, and a coffee maker. Our gym, pool, and private bathroom are yours to enjoy, as well. If you want to go to restaurants, bars, and night clubs, we're within driving distance.

hotels.name: The Luxury Collection Hotels
hotels.description: My comfortable 10+-bedroom hotel has everything you need for your Los Angeles trip. The unit comes with AC, Wi-Fi, and a coffee maker. During your stay, you can also enjoy using a convenient gym, pool, and private bathroom. Our Airbnb is within driving distance to several popular restaurants, bars, and night clubs. An ideal base to explore Los Angeles.

hotels.name: Sheraton Hotels & Resorts
hotels.description: Stay in this comfortable hotel and live like a true local in Belgrade. We're within driving distance to restaurants, bars, and night clubs. Our rental comes with 10+ bedrooms, and a gym, pool, and private bathroom that you're free to use any time. AC, Wi-Fi, a coffee maker -- we've got everything you need.

hotels.name: St. Regis Hotels & Resorts
